name: Order Reminder For WooCommerce
author: WPCocktail

sections.description: Order Reminder For WooCommerce plugin is designed to enhance customer engagement and feedback. It automatically sends a reminder email 30 days after an order is marked as ‘completed’. This email invites customers to rate and review the product(s) they purchased. This plugin helps in gathering valuable customer feedback and improving product ratings.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the order-reminder-for-woocommerce folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. The plugin works automatically, no configuration needed.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin free?

Yes, it is entirely free to use.

Does it work with any theme?

Yes, as long as you are using WooCommerce, it should work with any theme.

Can I customize the email content?

This version sends a standard email. For customization, you would need to modify the plugin code.

Is it compatible with the latest version of WordPress and WooCommerce?

It is compatible with WordPress 5.9 and tested with WooCommerce 5.0.0. However, ensure compatibility with the latest versions before use.
